properties.question: What is a characteristic feature of haemorrhoidal thrombosis as seen in the provided photograph?
properties.option_a: A visible external clot with surrounding inflammation
properties.option_b: A soft, bulging hemorrhoid without any clot formation
properties.option_c: A clot located within the rectum accompanied by ulceration
properties.option_d: Multiple clots spreading throughout the rectal lining
